title: Introduction to Web Development
excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern, responsive websites from scratch.

lectures.title: Welcome & Course Overview
lectures.description: Welcome to the course! Overview of structure and goals.

lectures.title: The Basics of HTML
lectures.description: Dive into the foundational building block of the web: HTML. We'll explore essential tags, document structure, and semantic HTML5 elements to create well-structured web pages.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
excerpt: Master the art of online marketing, from SEO and content strategy to social media and paid advertising.

lectures.title: Foundations of Digital Marketing
lectures.description: Understand the digital marketing ecosystem, key channels, and how to develop a cohesive strategy for your business or brand.

lectures.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
lectures.description: Uncover the secrets of ranking higher on Google. We'll cover on-page, off-page, and technical SEO techniques to drive organic traffic.

title: Introduction to Python Programming
excerpt: A beginner-friendly introduction to Python, one of the world's most popular and versatile programming languages.

lectures.title: Setting Up Your Environment
lectures.description: Let's get started by installing Python and setting up our code editor (VS Code). A smooth setup process is key to a great learning experience.

lectures.title: Variables and Data Types
lectures.description: Learn about the fundamental data types in Python: strings, integers, floats, and booleans. Understand how to store and manipulate data using variables.
